name: df-erALTV
comment: Equivalence relation with natural domain predicate, see also the comment of ~ df-ers . Alternate definition is ~ dferALTV2 . Binary equivalence relation with natural domain and the equivalence relation with natural domain predicate are the same when ` A ` and ` R ` are sets, see ~ brerser . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 12-Aug-2021.)
